name: Bloop Bloop!
description:
Keep Bloops from going extinct from an epidemic by killing those that are sick to prevent the endless epidemic from killing the Bloop population.

Click on sick Bloops to blow them up in a small explosion area of effect… this will cure those surrounding that Bloops. If a Bloops dies on its own… hell will break loose. It will explode and spread the joy of death among other Bloops. Striking sick Bloops will provide healing Combos and will give the player additional Bloops and score multipliers! Good luck!

Next few things...
- Testing the Difficulty Curve (currently way too easy) 
- Explosion effects
- Modeling more and artwork.
- My own music...
